author: nflaig
content: still looking more into it but I believe I found a bug in our gossip validation, we have a seen aggregates map which still uses the committee index as key, this was correct pre-electra since `hash_tree_root(aggregate.data)` would be different per committee anyways, but since electra it can be the same `data` across committees which we let slip through to the application layer (hence a lot of duplicates in the metric above), might be that Prysm has the same issue
